æ’å…¥æ’åº $O(n^2)$ O(1) ç¨³å®š nè¾ƒå°ï¼Œåˆå§‹åºåˆ—åŸºæœ¬æœ‰åº

é“¾å¼åŸºæ•°æ’åº $O(d(n+rd))$ $O(rd)$ ç¨³å®š nå¤§ï¼Œå…³é”®å­—å€¼å°

ç›¸å…³æ¦‚å¿µ

1.è¯„ä»·æŒ‡æ ‡

æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œç®—æ³•çš„ç¨³å®šæ€§

2.åˆ†ç±»

1.ç®—æ³•æ€æƒ³

æ¯æ¬¡å°†â¼€ä¸ªå¾…æ’åºçš„è®°å½•æŒ‰å…¶å…³é”®å­—â¼¤â¼©æ’â¼Šåˆ°å‰â¾¯å·²æ’å¥½åºçš„â¼¦åºåˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œ ç›´åˆ°å…¨éƒ¨è®°å½•æ’â¼Šå®Œæˆã€‚

2.ä»£ç å®ç°

//é€’å¢æ’åº
void InsertSort(int A[],int n){//é•¿åº¦ä¸ºnçš„intå‹æ•°ç»„
    int i,j,temp;
    for (i = 1; i < n; i++)
        if (A[i] < A[i-1]) {//å¦‚æœA[i]çš„å°äºå…¶å‰é©±åˆ™è¿›è¡ŒA[i]çš„ç§»åŠ¨
            temp=A[i];//ä¸´æ—¶ä¿å­˜A[i]
            for (j = i-1; j>=0 && A[j]>temp; j--)//ä¾æ¬¡æ£€æŸ¥A[i]ä¹‹å‰å·²ç»æ’å¥½åºçš„å…ƒç´ 
                A[j+1]=A[j];//å¤§äºtempçš„åç§»
            A[j+1]=temp;//æœ€ç»ˆå¤åˆ¶åˆ°æ’å…¥ä½ç½®
        }
}

3.ä¼˜åŒ–æ€è·¯

æŠ˜åŠæ’å…¥æ’åºâ€”â€”å…ˆç”¨æŠ˜åŠæŸ¥æ‰¾æ‰¾åˆ°åº”è¯¥æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œå†è¿›è¡Œç§»åŠ¨å…ƒç´ ã€‚

void InsertSort(int A[],int n){
    int i,j,low,high,mid;
    for (i = 2; i < n; i++) {
        A[0]=A[i];
        low=1,high=i-1;//æŠ˜åŠæŸ¥æ‰¾çš„èŒƒå›´
        while (low<=high) {
            mid=(low+high)/2;
            if (A[mid>A[0]]) high=mid-1;//æŸ¥æ‰¾å·¦éƒ¨åˆ†
            else low=mid+1;//æŸ¥æ‰¾å³éƒ¨åˆ†
        }
        for (j = i-1; j>=high+1; j--)//iä¹‹å‰å…ƒç´ å…¨éƒ¨åç§»
            A[j+1]=A[j];
        A[high+1]=A[0];//æ’å…¥
    }
}

void QuickSort(int A[],int low,int high) {//å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº
    if (low<high) {//é€’å½’è·³å‡ºçš„æ¡ä»¶
        int pivotpos=Partition(A,low,high);//è¿›è¡Œâ€œåˆ’åˆ†â€
        QuickSort(A,low,pivotpos-1);//å¤„ç†å·¦å­è¡¨
        QuickSort(A,pivotpos+1,high);//å¤„ç†å³å­è¡¨
    }
}
int Partition(int A[],int low,int high){//"åˆ’åˆ†"å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å› æ¢è½´ ä½ç½®
    int pivot=A[low];//å–lowä½œä¸ºæ¢è½´
    while (low<high) {//ç”¨low,highæœå¯»æ¢è½´ä½ç½®
        while (low<high && A[high]>pivot) high--;
        A[low]=A[high];//æ¯”æ¢è½´å°çš„å…ƒç´ ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å·¦ç«¯
        while (low<high && A[low]<pivot) low++;
        A[high]=A[low];//æ¯”æ¢è½´å¤§çš„å…ƒç´ ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å³ç«¯
    }
    A[low]=pivot;//æ”¹å˜æ¢è½´lowä½ç½®
    return low;
}

//è°ƒæ•´ä»¥kä¸ºæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ ‘ä¸ºå¤§æ ¹å †
void HeadAdjust(int A[],int k,int len){
    A[0]=A[k];
    //å¯»æ‰¾A[k]åº”è¯¥æ’å…¥çš„ä½ç½®--â€œä¸‹å â€
    for (int i = 2*k; i <= len; i*=2) {

            i++;

        else{

}

int *B=(int *)malloc(n*sizeof(int));//è¾…åŠ©æ•°ç»„ï¼Œé•¿åº¦ç­‰äºAæ•°ç»„

//A[low...mid]å’ŒA[mid+1...high]å„è‡ªæœ‰åºï¼Œå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†å½’å¹¶
void Merge(int A[],int low,int mid,int high) {
    int i,j,k;
    for (k = low; k <= high; k++) //å°†A[low...high]å¤åˆ¶åˆ°B
        B[k]=A[k];
    for (i = low,j=mid+1,k=i; i <= mid&&j<=k; k++) {//å½’å¹¶
        if (B[i]<=B[j]) //è¾ƒå°è€…å¤åˆ¶åˆ°Aä¸­
            A[k]=B[i++];
        else A[k]=B[j++];
    }//for
    while (i<=mid) A[k++]=B[i++];
    while (j<=high) A[k++]=B[j++];
}

void MergeSort(int A[],int low,int high) {
    if (low<high) {
        int mid=(low+high)/2;//ä»ä¸­é—´åˆ’åˆ†
        MergeSort(A,low,mid);//å·¦éƒ¨åˆ†å½’å¹¶
        MergeSort(A,mid+1,high);//å³éƒ¨åˆ†å½’å¹¶
        Merge(A,low,mid,high);//ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†å½’å¹¶
    }
}

int BinarySearch(SSTable L,int key){
    int low=0,high=L.TableLen-1,mid;
    while (low<=high) {
        mid=(low+high)/2;
        if (L.elem[mid]==key)
            return key;
        else if(L.elem[mid]>key)//ä»å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†ç»§ç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾
            high=mid-1;
        else//ä»ååŠéƒ¨åˆ†ç»§ç»­æŸ¥æ‰¾
            low=mid+1;
    }
    return -1;
}

item.title: å›¾çš„åº”ç”¨

ğŸ“Œä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Ÿ

è¿é€šå›¾çš„ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘æ˜¯åŒ…å«å›¾ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰é¡¶ç‚¹çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæå°è¿é€šå­å›¾ï¼Œé€šä¿—åœ°è®²ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯â€œè¾¹å°½å¯èƒ½å°‘ï¼Œä½†éœ€ä¿æŒè¿é€šâ€ã€‚

è§„å¾‹ï¼š å¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹æ•°|V|=nçš„æ ‘ï¼Œå…¶ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„è¾¹æ•°|E|=n-1ã€‚å¦‚æœå°†|E|+1ï¼Œå¿…ç„¶ä¼šå½¢æˆå›è·¯ï¼›å¦‚æœå°†|E|-1ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šæˆä¸ºéè¿é€šå›¾ã€‚

ğŸ“Œä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Ÿ

æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œä¹Ÿç§°æœ€å°ä»£ä»·æ ‘(Minimum Spanning Treeï¼ŒMST)

æ˜¯å¸¦æƒè¿é€šæ— å‘å›¾çš„ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ä¸­è¾¹çš„æƒå€¼ä¹‹å’Œæœ€å°çš„ä¸€æ£µæ ‘ï¼Œè”ç³»å®é™…é—®é¢˜ä¸éš¾ç†è§£å…¶ä¸­â€œæœ€å°ä»£ä»·â€çš„æ„å‘³ã€‚

Primï¼ˆæ™®åˆ©å§†ç®—æ³•ï¼‰ï¼ŒKruskalï¼ˆå…‹é²æ–¯å¡å°”ç®—æ³•ï¼‰å°±æ˜¯å¯»æ‰¾æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„å¸¸ç”¨ç®—æ³•ã€‚

1.Primï¼ˆæ™®åˆ©å§†ç®—æ³•ï¼‰

ä»æŸä¸€é¡¶ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å°†ä»£ä»·æœ€å°çš„æ–°é¡¶ç‚¹çº³å…¥ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ï¼Œç›´è‡³æ‰€æœ‰é¡¶ç‚¹éƒ½çº³å…¥ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚

å›¾ç¤º

æ˜“çŸ¥ï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ³•å¾—åˆ°çš„æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆå­æ ‘æ˜¯ä¸å”¯ä¸€çš„ã€‚

ä»£ç å®ç°

void MiniSpanTree_PRIMI(Graph G,int u){
    //ä»é¡¶ç‚¹uå‡ºå‘æ‰¾Gçš„æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘
    for (int i = 0; i <G.vexnum; ++i) {//è¾…åŠ©æ•°ç»„åˆå§‹åŒ–
        if(i!=u){
            closedge[i]={u,G.arcs[u][i]};
        }        
    }
    closedge[u].lowcost=0;
    for (int j = 0; j < G.vexnum; j++) {
        k=minimum(closedge);//æ±‚ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
        cout<<cloedge[k].adjvex<<G.vex[k];
        closedge[k].lowcost=0;
        for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; i++) {
            if (G.arc[k][j].adj<closedge[j].lowcost) {
                closedge[j]={G.vexs[k],G.arcs[k][j].adj};
            }
        }
    }
}

2.Kruskalï¼ˆå…‹é²æ–¯å¡å°”ç®—æ³•ï¼‰

æ¯æ¬¡é€‰æ‹©ä¸€æ¡æƒå€¼æœ€å°çš„è¾¹ï¼Œä½¿è¿™æ¡è¾¹çš„ä¸¤å¤´è¿é€šï¼ˆåŸæœ¬å·²ç»è¿é€šçš„å°±ä¸é€‰ï¼‰ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ç»“ç‚¹éƒ½è¿é€šã€‚

å›¾ç¤º

ä»£ç å®ç°

void Kruskal(Graph G){
    //å®šä¹‰ä¿å­˜ä¸€æ¡è¾¹çš„æƒå€¼çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä»»æ„ä¸¤ä¸ªé¡¶ç‚¹ä¹‹é—´çš„è¾¹æƒå€¼éƒ½å¯èƒ½è¢«ä¿å­˜è¿›å»
    int SortVal[G.arcnum][G.arcnum];
    for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; i++) 
        for (int j = 0; j < G.vexnum; j++) 
            if (Adjacent(G,G.Vex[i],G.Vex[j])) {//å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨è¾¹|å¼§
                SortVal[i][j]=Get_edge_value(G,G.Vex[i],G.Vex[j]);//è·å–æƒå€¼å¹¶ä¿å­˜
            }
    // Paixu(SortVal);
}

æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦

ç®—æ³• æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ é€‚ç”¨æ–¹å‘
P O(V^2) è¾¹ç¨ å¯†å›¾
K $O(E\log_2 E)$ è¾¹ç¨€ç–å›¾

äºŒã€æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„

æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ ç®—æ³•
å•æºè·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜ BFS (æ— æƒå›¾)
Dijkstra(å¸¦æƒå›¾ã€æ— æƒå›¾)
å„ç‚¹é—´è·¯å¾„ Floyd(å¸¦æƒå›¾ã€æ— æƒå›¾)

1.BFS

ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥å«BFSï¼Œæ˜¯å› ä¸ºè¯¥æ–¹æ³•æ±‚æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„æ˜¯åœ¨å›¾çš„å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†ç®—æ³•(BFS)çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šï¼Œæ±‚å¾—äº†æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ã€‚

ä»£ç å®ç°

//æ±‚é¡¶ç‚¹uåˆ°å…¶ä»–é¡¶ç‚¹çš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„
void BFS_MIN_Distance(Graph G,int u){
    bool visited[MAX_VERTEX_NUM];
    SqQueue Q;//è¾…åŠ©é˜Ÿåˆ—
    
    int d[G.vexnum];//d[i]è¡¨ç¤ºä»uåˆ°içš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„
    int path[G.vexnum];//path[i]è¡¨ç¤ºæœ€çŸ­è·¯å¾„ä»å“ªä¸ªç»“ç‚¹å‡ºæ¥ï¼ˆå‰é©±ï¼‰
    for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; ++i) {//åˆå§‹åŒ–
        d[i]=INIFINITY;
        path[i]=-1;
    }
    d[u]=0;
    visited[u]=true;
    EnQueue(Q,u);
    while(!isEmpty(Q)){
        DeQueue(Q,u);
        for (w=FirstNeighbor(G,u);w>=0;w=NextNeighbor(G,u,w))
            if (!visited[w]) {
                // visit(w);
                d[w]=d[u]+1;
                path[w]=u;
                visited[w]=true;
                EnQueue(Q,w);
            }//if
    }//while
}

bool TopologicalSort(Graph G){
    InitStack(S);//åˆå§‹åŒ–æ ˆï¼Œå­˜å‚¨é¡¶ç‚¹çš„å…¥åº¦
    for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; i++) {
        if (indegree[i]==0) {
            Push(S,i);//å…¥åº¦ä¸º0çš„é¡¶ç‚¹å…¥æ ˆ
        }
    }
    int count=0;//è®°å½•å·²ç»è¾“å‡ºçš„é¡¶ç‚¹æ•°
    while(!isEmpty(S)){
        Pop(S,i);
        print[count++]=i;//è¾“å‡ºé¡¶ç‚¹iï¼Œå¹¶è®¡æ•°
        for (p=G.vextices[i].firstarc;p;p=p->nextarc) {
            //å°†æ‰€æœ‰iæŒ‡å‘çš„é¡¶ç‚¹å…¥åº¦å‡1ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å°†å…¥åº¦å‡ä¸º0çš„é¡¶ç‚¹å…¥æ ˆscanf
            v=p->adjvex;
            if (!(--indegree[v])) {
                Push(S,v);//å…¥åº¦ä¸º0ï¼Œå…¥æ ˆ
            }
        }//for
    }//while
    if (count<G.vexnum) {
        return false;//æ’åºå¤±è´¥ï¼Œæœ‰å‘å›¾ä¸­æœ‰å›è·¯
    }else{
        return true; //æˆåŠŸ
    }
}

void DFSTraverse(Graph G){
    for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; ++i)
        visited[i]=false;
    for (int v = 0; v < G.vexnum; ++v)
        if (!visited[v])
            DFS(G,v);
}

bool TopologicalSort_DFS(Graph G,int v){
    visit(v);
    visited[v]=true;
    for (w=FirstNeighbor(G,v);w>=0;w=FirstNeighbor(G,v))//å¤„ç†vçš„æ‰€æœ‰é‚»æ¥ç‚¹
        if (!visited[w]) {
            TopologicalSort_DFS(G,w);
        }
    print(v);//è¾“å‡ºé¡¶ç‚¹    
}

SqQueue Q;//è¾…åŠ©é˜Ÿåˆ—
void BFSTraverse(Graph G){

    for (int i = 0; i < G.vexnum; ++i) {//ä½¿ä¸‹æ ‡ä»1å¼€å§‹
        visited[i]=false;
    }
    //å¯¹éè¿é€šå›¾çš„å¤„ç†
    for (int v = 0; v < G.vexnum; ++v) {

}

//ä»é¡¶ç‚¹vå‡ºå‘å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†å›¾G
void BFS(Graph G,int v){
    visit(v);
    visited[v]=true;
    EnQueue(Q,v);//é¡¶ç‚¹vå…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—Q
    while(!isEmpty(Q)){
        DeQueue(Q,v);//é¡¶ç‚¹vå‡ºé˜Ÿåˆ—Q
        for (w=FirstNeighbor(G,v);w>=0;w=NextNeighbor(G,v,w))//å¤„ç†vçš„æ‰€æœ‰é‚»æ¥ç‚¹
            if (!visited[w]) {
                visit(w);
                visited[w]=true;
                EnQueue(Q,w);
            }//if
    }//while
}

//é€’å½’å®ç°å¤šç»´æ•°ç»„keyçš„å¤§å°å†™è½¬æ¢
<?php

];
/**
 * @param array $arr
 * @param string $type
 * @return array
 */
function fin_array_change_key_case(array $arr, string $type = 'CASE_UPPER'): array
{
    $action = $type == "CASE_UPPER" ? 'strtoupper' : 'strtolower';
    foreach ($arr as $k => $v) {
        //åˆ æ‰åŸå…ˆçš„
        unset($arr[$k]);
        //æ–°çš„æ•°ç»„
        $arr[$action($k)] = is_array($v)
            ? fin_array_change_key_case($v)
            : $v;
    }
    return $arr;
}

<?php
//å¾—åˆ°å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´çš„å‡½æ•°
/**æµ‹è¯•å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´
 * @param null $begin
 * @param null $end
 * @return array|float|mixed|string
 */
function runtime($begin = null, $end = null)
{
    static $cache = [];
    if (is_null($begin)) {
        return $cache;
    } elseif (is_null($end)) {
        return $cache[$begin] = microtime(true);
    } else {
        //ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼
        $end = $cache[$end] ?? microtime(true);
        return round($end - $cache[$begin],2);
    }
}

//æµ‹è¯•forå’Œwhileå¾ªç¯
$LEN=10000000;

//1.for
runtime('for');
for ($i = 0; $i < $LEN; $i++) {}
runtime('forEnd');
echo 'forå¾ªç¯:'.runtime('for', 'forEnd');

echo "<hr>";

//2.while
runtime('while');
$i=0;
while ($i<$LEN){$i++;};
runtime('whileEnd');
echo 'whileå¾ªç¯:'.runtime('while', 'whileEnd');
echo "<hr>";
echo 'æ€»æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´:'.runtime('for','whileEnd');

<?php

/**
 * Class FileHandle
 * @param $path //sessionå‚¨å­˜è·¯å¾„
 * @param $maxlifetime //sessionæ–‡ä»¶è¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´
 */
class FileHandle implements SessionHandlerInterface
{

    protected $path;

    protected $maxlifetime;

    public function __construct($path = "session", $maxlifetime = "1440")
    {
        $this->path = $this->mkdir($path);
        $this->maxlifetime = $maxlifetime;
    }

    private function mkdir($path)
    {
        is_dir($path) || mkdir($path);

        return realpath($path);
    }

    public function close(): bool
    {
        return true;
    }

    public function destroy($session_id): bool
    {
        if (is_file($this->path."/".$session_id)) {
            @unlink($this->path."/".$session_id);
        }

        return true;
    }

    public function gc($maxlifetime): bool
    {
        foreach (glob($this->path."/*") as $file) {
            if (filemtime($file) + $this->maxlifetime < time()) {
                @unlink($file);
            }
        }

        return true;
    }


    public function open($path, $name): bool
    {
        return true;
    }

    public function read($session_id): string
    {
        return (string)@file_get_contents($this->path."/".$session_id);
    }

    public function write($session_id, $session_data): bool
    {
        return (bool)@file_put_contents($this->path."/".$session_id, $session_data);
    }

}

/**æ ¼å¼åŒ–è·å–ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´å¤§å°
 * æ³¨æ„æ•°ç»„çš„é¡ºåºï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ç”±å¤§åˆ°å°!!!!
 * @param int $total
 * @return string
 */
function space_total(int $total):string
{
    $config=[3=>'GB',2=>'MB',1=>'KB'];
    foreach ($config as $num=>$unit) {
        if ($total>pow(1024,$num)){
            return round($total/pow(1024,$num)).$unit;
        }
    }
    return $total.'B';
}

/**ç»Ÿè®¡ç›®å½•å¤§å°
 * @param string $dir
 * @return int
 */
function dir_size(string $dir = "."): int
{
    $size = 0;
    foreach (glob($dir . "/*") as $file) {
        $size += is_file($file)?filesize($file):dir_size($file);
    }
    return $size;
}

[5] é€’å½’å¤åˆ¶æ•´ä½“ç›®å½•

:::details

/**é€’å½’å¤åˆ¶æ•´ä½“ç›®å½•
 * @param string $from
 * @param string $to
 * @return bool
 */
function copy_dir(string $from, string $to): bool
{
    !is_dir($to) && mkdir($to, 0755, true);
    foreach (glob($from . "/*") as $file) {
        $target = $to . "/" . basename($file);
        is_file($file)
            ? copy($file, $target)
            : copy_dir($file, $target);
    };
    return true;
}

:::

/**åˆ é™¤å¤šçº§ç›®å½•
 * åƒä¸‡å°å¿ƒï¼ï¼ï¼
 * @param string $dir
 * @return bool
 */
function del_dir(string $dir)
{
    if (!is_dir($dir)) {
        return true;
    }
    foreach (glob($dir . "/*") as $file) {
        is_file($file) ? unlink($file) : del_dir($file);
    }
    return rmdir($dir);
}

:::

éªŒè¯ç ç±»

ç»˜åˆ¶ç”»å¸ƒï¼Œè®¾ç½®èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ï¼Œå…ˆå†™å…¥éšæœºæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œç„¶åç»˜åˆ¶éšæœºå¹²æ‰°çº¿ï¼Œå¹²æ‰°ç‚¹å°±å¯

<?php

class Verificationcode
{

    protected $width;

    protected $height;

    protected $len;

    public $imgsource;

    protected $size;

    protected $fontfile;

    protected $rescode;

    public function __construct($w = 200, $h = 50, $len = 4, $size = null)
    {
        $this->width = $w;
        $this->height = $h;
        $this->len = $len;
        $this->size = is_null($size) ? $h * 0.4 : $size;
        $this->fontfile = realpath("source.ttf");
    }

    public function render()
    {
        $this->bg();
        $this->line();//æ–‡å­—ä¸‹
        $this->text();
        $this->line();//æ–‡å­—ä¸Š
        $this->pix();
        $this->show();

        return $this->rescode;
    }

    //ç»˜åˆ¶ç”»å¸ƒ
    private function bg()
    {
        $img = imageCreateTrueColor($this->width, $this->height);
        $this->imgsource = $img;
        imagefill(
            $img,
            0,
            0,
            imageColorAllocate($img, 120, 120, 120)
        );
    }

    //ç»˜åˆ¶éšæœºçº¿æ¡
    private function line()
    {
        for ($i = 0; $i < 3; $i++) {
            imagesetthickness($this->imgsource, mt_rand(1, 3));
            imageLine(
                $this->imgsource,
                mt_rand(0, $this->width),
                mt_rand(0, $this->height),
                mt_rand(0, $this->width),
                mt_rand(0, $this->height),
                $this->ran_color()
            );
        }
    }

    //ç»˜åˆ¶å¹²æ‰°ç‚¹
    private function pix()
    {
        for ($i = 0; $i < 800; $i++) {
            imagesetpixel(
                $this->imgsource,
                mt_rand(0, $this->width),
                mt_rand(0, $this->height),
                $this->ran_color()
            );
        }
    }

    //éšæœºæ–‡æœ¬
    private function text()
    {
        $range = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
        $code = '';
        for ($i = 0; $i < $this->len; $i++) {
            $text = $range[mt_rand(0, strlen($range) - 1)];
            $box = imagettfbbox($this->size, 0, $this->fontfile, $range[$i]);
            imagettftext(
                $this->imgsource,
                $this->size,
                mt_rand(-30, 30),
                ($this->width / $this->len) * $i + 10,
                $this->height / 2 + ($box[0] - $box[7]) / 2,
                $this->ran_text_color(),
                $this->fontfile,
                strtoupper($text)
            );
            $code .= strtoupper($text);
        }
        $this->rescode = $code;
    }

    //è®¾ç½®å¤´ä¿¡æ¯å¹¶ä¸”è¾“å‡ºpng
    private function show()
    {
        header('Content-type:image/png');
        imagepng($this->imgsource);
    }

    private function ran_color()
    {
        return imageColorAllocate(
            $this->imgsource,
            mt_rand(0, 255),
            mt_rand(0, 255),
            mt_rand(0, 255),
        );
    }

    private function ran_text_color()
    {
        return imageColorAllocate(
            $this->imgsource,
            mt_rand(0, 80),
            mt_rand(0, 80),
            mt_rand(0, 80),
        );
    }

}

const protects = Symbol('å—ä¿æŠ¤çš„å±æ€§')

const protects = new WeakMap()

            throw new Error('ä¸åˆæ³•çš„åœ°å€!')
        }
        protects.set(this, {...protects.get(this), host})
    }

    get host() {

    }

}

class Tools {
    max(arr) {
        return arr.sort((a, b) => b - a)[0]
    }

    getByKey(key) {
        return this.data.filter(i => i.name.toUpperCase().includes(key.toUpperCase()))
    }
}

class Lesson extends Tools {
    constructor(data) {
        super();
        this.data = data
    }

    /*åˆ©ç”¨superä½¿ç”¨çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•*/
    get mostExpensive() {
        return super.max.call(null, this.data.map(i => i.price))
    }

    /*é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•*/
    getByKey(key) {
        return super.getByKey(key).map(i => i.name)
    }
}

    {name: "Vue.js", price: 99}
];
let lesson = new Lesson(data)
console.log(lesson);
console.log(lesson.mostExpensive);//198
console.log(lesson.getByKey('js'));//[ 'JS', 'Vue.js' ]

function deepCopy(obj) {

function Vue() {
    let proxy = new Proxy({}, {
        set(target, p, value, receiver) {
            document.querySelectorAll(`[v-model=${p}]`).forEach(i => {
                i.value = value
            })
            document.querySelectorAll(`[v-bind=${p}]`).forEach(i => {
                i.innerHTML = value
            })
        },
        get(target, p, receiver) {}
    })
    this.init = function () {
        document.querySelectorAll('[v-model]').forEach(i => {
            i.addEventListener('keyup', function () {
                proxy[i.getAttribute('v-model')] = i.value
            })
        })
    }
}

function dateFormat(date, format = "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS") {
    date = new Date(date)
    const config = {
        YYYY: date.getFullYear(),
        MM: date.getMonth() + 1,
        DD: date.getDate(),

        mm: date.getMinutes(),
        SS: date.getSeconds(),
    }

        config[key] = String(config[key]).length < 2 ? '0' + config[key] : config[key]

}

function doLoop( arr ){

    arr.loop_idx = 0;

    // è¿”å›å½“å‰çš„å…ƒç´ 
    arr.current = function(){

      if( this.loop_idx < 0 ){// ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æ£€æŸ¥
        this.loop_idx = this.length - 1;// æ›´æ–° loop_idx
      }

      if( this.loop_idx >= this.length ){// ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡æ£€æŸ¥
        this.loop_idx = 0;// æ›´æ–° loop_idx
      }

      return arr[ this.loop_idx ];//è¿”å›å…ƒç´ 
    };
    
    // å¢åŠ  loop_idx ç„¶åè¿”å›æ–°çš„å½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
    arr.next = function(){
      this.loop_idx++;
      return this.current();
    };
    // å‡å°‘ loop_idx ç„¶åè¿”å›æ–°çš„å½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
    arr.prev = function(){
      this.loop_idx--;
      return this.current();
    };
}

function make_looper( arr ){

    arr.loop_idx = 0;

    // return current item
    arr.current = function(){
      this.loop_idx = ( this.loop_idx ) % this.length;// æ— éœ€æ£€æŸ¥ !!
      return arr[ this.loop_idx ];
    };

    // å¢åŠ  loop_idx ç„¶åè¿”å›æ–°çš„å½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
    arr.next = function(){
      this.loop_idx++;
      return this.current();
    };
    
    // å‡å°‘ loop_idx ç„¶åè¿”å›æ–°çš„å½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
    arr.prev = function(){
      this.loop_idx += this.length - 1;
      return this.current();
    };
}

    function doCopy($el, {deepCopy = false, copyTips = true, language = "Chinese", bgColor = "#ff6666", fontColor = "#fff"} = {}) {
        let tempEl = $("<input id='selectEl' type='text' value=''>").val($el.text())
        if (deepCopy) {
            tempEl.val($el.html())
        }
        tempEl.appendTo($("body"))
        document.querySelector('#selectEl').select();
        document.execCommand('copy');
        tempEl.remove()
        if (copyTips) {
            let tipEl = $("<div class='copyTips' >æˆåŠŸå¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªåˆ‡æ¿</div>")
            tipEl.css({fontFamily: "'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif",fontSize: "1.2rem",position: "fixed",top: "1rem",textAlign: "center", left: "50%",fontWeight: "bolder", borderRadius: ".5rem",marginLeft: "-8rem",width: "16rem",height: "3rem", lineHeight:"3rem", background: bgColor,boxShadow: "0 6px 10px -8px #000",color: fontColor, letterSpacing: "4px",boxSizing: "border-box",padding: "0 10px 0 10px", display: "none"})
            if (language === "English") {
                tipEl.text('Successfully copied!').css({letterSpacing: "0"})
            }
            tipEl.appendTo($("body"))
            $(".copyTips").fadeIn(800)
            setTimeout(function () {
                $(".copyTips").fadeOut(500)
            }, 1000)
        }
    }

    function newArr({min = null, max = null, len = null} = {}) {

/*loadFile.js(åœ¨window.onloadä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼ŒåŠ è½½DOMæ ‘)*/	
$(function () {
    function addImg(imgNum,eleID) {
        let container
        for (let i = 1; i < imgNum; i++) {
            container=$("<div class='container'><div class='pic'><img src='images/"+i+".jpg' alt=''></div></div>")

/*******************************************/
/*main.js(åœ¨$(function(){})ä¹‹å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼ŒDOMæ ‘åŠ è½½å®Œæ¯• )*/
window.onload=function () {
   let waterFall=function (eleID) {
        let boxWidth = 0, colo = 0, $egEle = $(eleID).children().eq(0), boxArr = [], heightArr = [], minHeight = 0,minHeightInd = 0
        /*1.çˆ¶ç›’å­å±…ä¸­*/
        /*1.1ç›’å­å®½åº¦*/
        boxWidth = $egEle.outerWidth()
        /*1.2åˆ—æ•°*/
        colo = parseInt($(window).width() / boxWidth)
        /*1.3å®ç°å±…ä¸­*/
        $(eleID).css({
            // width: boxWidth * colo + "px",
            margin: "0 auto"
        })
        /*2.å®šä½ç›’å­*/
        /*2.1æ‰¾å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œç›’å­æœ€çŸ®çš„ä¸€ä¸ª*/
        /*2.1.1 ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œç›’å­é«˜åº¦æ•°åˆ—*/
        boxArr = $egEle.prevObject
        // console.log(boxArr);
        for (let i = 0; i < boxArr.length; i++) {
            if (i < colo) {//ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œç›’å­
                heightArr.push(boxArr.eq(i).outerHeight())
            } else {
                /*2.1.2 ç›’å­ä¸­æœ€çŸ®çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼åŠç´¢å¼•*/
                minHeight = Math.min.apply(null, heightArr)
                minHeightInd = heightArr.indexOf(minHeight)
                /*2.2å®šä½åç»­ç›’å­*/
                boxArr.eq(i).css({
                    position: "absolute",
                    top: minHeight + "px",
                    left: boxWidth * minHeightInd + "px"
                })
                /*2.3 é«˜åº¦æ•°åˆ—æ›´æ–°*/
                heightArr[minHeightInd] += boxArr.eq(i).outerHeight()
            }
        }
    }

    /*æ‰§è¡Œ*/
    waterFall("#box");
}

 *{margin: 0;padding: 0;border: none;}

<!--JSéƒ¨åˆ†-->
 window.onload = function () {
        // 1. è·å–éœ€è¦çš„æ ‡ç­¾
        var progress = document.getElementById("progress");
        var progress_bar = progress.children[0];
        var progress_bar_fg = progress_bar.children[0];
        var mask = progress_bar.children[1];
        var progress_value =  progress.children[1];

        // 2. ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡æŒ‰ä¸‹
        mask.onmousedown = function (event) {
            var e = event || window.event;

            // 2.1 è·å–åˆå§‹ä½ç½®
            var offsetLeft = event.clientX - mask.offsetLeft;

            // 2.2 ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡çš„ç§»åŠ¨
            document.onmousemove = function (event) {
                var e = event || window.event;

                // 2.3 è·å–ç§»åŠ¨çš„ä½ç½®
                var x = e.clientX - offsetLeft;

                // è¾¹ç•Œå€¼å¤„ç†
                if(x < 0){
                    x = 0;
                }else if(x >= progress_bar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth){
                    x = progress_bar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth;
                }

                // 2.4 èµ°èµ·æ¥
                mask.style.left = x + 'px';
                progress_bar_fg.style.width = x + 'px';
                progress_value.innerHTML = parseInt(x / (progress_bar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth) * 100) + '%';

                return false;
            };

            // 2.5 ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡æŠ¬èµ·
            document.onmouseup = function () {
                document.onmousemove = null;
            }
        }
    }

        <div id="progress_bar_fg"></div>

    </div>
    <div id="progress_value">0%</div>

//  addEventListener();
    //  removeEventListener();
    window.addEventListener('load', function (ev) {
        // 1. è·å–æ ‡ç­¾
        var progress = document.getElementById('progress');
        var progressBar = progress.children[0];
        var progressBarFg= progressBar.children[0];
        var mask= progressBar.children[1];
        var progressValue= progress.children[1];

        // 2. ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡åœ¨maskä¸Šé¢çš„æŒ‰ä¸‹
        mask.addEventListener('mousedown', function (evt) {
            var e = evt || window.event;
            // 2.1 è·å–æŒ‰ä¸‹çš„åæ ‡
            var pointX = e.pageX - mask.offsetLeft;
            // 2.2 ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡çš„ç§»åŠ¨
            document.addEventListener('mousemove', function (ev1) {
                var e = ev1 || window.event;
                // 2.3 è·å–æ°´å¹³æ–¹å‘ç§»åŠ¨çš„è·ç¦»
                var x = e.pageX - pointX;

                if(x < 0){
                    x = 0;
                }else if(x > progressBar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth){
                    x =  progressBar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth
                }

                // 2.4 èµ°èµ·æ¥
                mask.style.left = x + 'px';
                progressBarFg.style.width = x + 'px';
                progressValue.innerText = parseInt(x / (progressBar.offsetWidth - mask.offsetWidth)* 100) + '%';
                return false;
            }, false)
        }, false);

        // 3. ç›‘å¬é¼ æ ‡æ¾å¼€
        /* document.onmouseup = function (ev1) {
             document.addEventListener('mousemove', null);
         };*/


        document.addEventListener('mouseup', function (ev1) {
            document.removeEventListener('mousemove', null, false);
        }, false);



    });

function formatDate(cDate) {
        //1.åˆ¤æ–­
        if (!cDate instanceof Date){
            return;
        }
        //2.è½¬åŒ–
        var year=cDate.getFullYear();
        var month=cDate.getMonth();
        var date=cDate.getDate();
        var hour=cDate.getHours();
        var minute=cDate.getMinutes();
        var second=cDate.getSeconds();
        //2.1 è¡¥0
        month=month<10? '0'+month:month;
        date=date<10? '0'+date: date;
        minute=minute<10? '0'+minute:minute;
        second=second<10? '0'+second:second;
        return year + '-' + month + '-' + date + ' ' +hour+':'+minute+":"+second;
    }
    console.log(formatDate(new Date()));

3.åŒ€é€Ÿè¿åŠ¨å°è£…

 /**

     * @param{string} btnId
     * @param{string} boxId

    function linearAnimation(btnId, boxId, step, target) {
        // 1. è·å–éœ€è¦çš„æ ‡ç­¾
        var btn = document.getElementById(btnId);
        var box = document.getElementById(boxId);
        // 2. å®šä¹‰å˜é‡
        var timer = null, begin = 0;
        // 3. ç›‘å¬æŒ‰é’®çš„ç‚¹å‡»
        btn.onclick = function () {
            // 3.1 æ¸…é™¤å®šæ—¶å™¨
            clearInterval(timer);
            // 3.2 è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶å™¨
            timer = setInterval(function () {
                // ç›¸åŠ 
                begin += step;
                // åˆ¤æ–­
                if(begin >= target){
                    begin = target;
                    clearInterval(timer);
                }            
                // åŠ¨èµ·æ¥
                box.style.marginLeft = begin + 'px';
            }, 100);
        }
    }
